code: data[column] = data[column].apply(lambda x: x if re.match(r'^[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Za-z]{2,}$', str(x)) else 'Correo invalido')
data[column] = data[column].apply(lambda x: x if not isinstance(x, str) else re.sub(r'[^A-Za-z0-9\\\\s]', '', unidecode(x.replace('ñ', 'n').replace('Ñ', 'N'))))
